channel.title: How do I make a weapon into a cape
channel.description: Ok, I'm using the grain bag in my server right now (you carry it on your back) and it's in the weapon spot.. I looked in all my files, object handler and everything, and I don't know how to change it into a cape (cape spot) PLEASE HELP!
